name: Followers of Nim - Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
name_original: Followers of Nim - Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
description:
Use your abilities as a cult leader to gain followers and solve puzzles.

WASD to move, Mouse to view.

Space bar to push and E to indoctrinate.

Right click to bring the most recently indoctrinated follower (wearing white) to you and then hurl them over short walls by left clicking.

To move each colored object, you need enough followers in order to be strong enough, although the followers do not need to be nearby.

Orange - 1 or more followers

Yellow - 2 or more followers

Green - 3 or more followers

Blue - 4 or more followers

Purple - 5 or more followers
